start.paragraph: This completes your secure access to this service.

no-cases-found.paragraph: There are no cases associated with this email. Please check you used the correct email, and access this service again via the IMA start page.

cannot-use-form.paragraph-1: You can only continue your claim if you are in the UK.

why-are-you-submitting-late.paragraph1: You must upload evidence of why you could not submit in time

confirm.submit-warning: You will not be able to change your answers after you submit.

declaration-immigration-adviser.paragraph1: What language was used to read the completed form to {{values.name}}?

declaration-someone-else.paragraph1: What language was used to read the completed form to {{values.name}}?

confirmation.paragraph1: We have sent a copy of completed form to:
confirmation.paragraph2: We will make decision about your claim, then contact you to tell you what you need to do next.
confirmation.header3: If you need to send more evidence
confirmation.paragraph3: You can email evidence to [EMAIL ADDRESS]
confirmation.paragraph4: Your email must include the Unique application number {{values.uan}} and date of birth you used to sign in to this form.
confirmation.paragraph5: Information about how to send more evidence is also on the email we send you when you submitted this form.
